name: com.unity.todotree
description:
The TODO Tree for Unity

* Support Features:

    1. Tag		(TODO, FIXME)
    2. Prority	(Minor, Medium, Major)
    3. Progress	(Active, On-Hold, Completed)
    4. Reorder	(Drag & Drop the todo)

* How To Use:

Open TODO Tree editor located in 'Window -> TODO Tree' at the top bar.

You can edit settings in the TODOTree window or manually add more custom items (tag, priority, progress) to the TodoConfig asset.

If you want to hide todo buttons in each inspector, you can turn off the 'Inspector GUI' on the TodoConfig asset.
